name: Mana & Steel
description:
Description

Mana and Steel is a cooperative medieval fantasy game about two hero’s defending their village from waves of enemies seeking to steal the villages ancient and powerful treasure.

 Key Features

  • Melee and ranged attacks for both players. The Swordsman is better at melee and the Mage is better at ranged.

  • Fight off waves of enemies

  • Build defensive walls, traps and towers between waves to protect the village.

  • Every five waves fight off a terrifying boss.

  • Players share lives. If the total lives goes to zero it’s game over.
